tool_description: API to get live covid news from around the globe
name: Covid News Live
title: Covid News Live

api_list.name: Get a providers news
api_list.description: get all the latest news from the specific provider
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/news24"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All news
api_list.description: get all the latest news from all the providers
